duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and present a training curriculum for Warren CAT in the service area.
Develop and schedule course material that provides broad and in-depth knowledge of engines, heavy equipment, or soft skill training.
Maintain the classroom and training equipment to facilitate learning.
Teach the company values, including safety, ethics, and customer service to students.
Demonstrate critical thinking in problem definition, data collection, and conclusion drawing.
Communicate orally in person and by phone for a significant portion of the day.

education_certification.credential: Previous experience and/or college education in training or adult education.
Significant background working with engines or heavy equipment; generally a minimum of 1-3 years’ experience or soft skills.
